title: [Whistler's Pass, Basin]
description: The creek flows into a large pool here before continuing to the north.  Dew drips from the rocks overhanging the pool.  Moonlight gleams across the pool's calm surface.
The creek flows into a large pool here before continuing to the north.  Dew drips from the rocks overhanging the pool.  Sunlight gleams across the pool's calm surface.
